quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not so sure.
author: Anonymous

quote: I don't suffer from insanity; I enjoy every minute of it.
author: Anonymous

quote: When life gives you melons, you might be dyslexic.
author: Anonymous

quote: If at first you don't succeed, then skydiving definitely isn't for you.
author: Anonymous

quote: The early bird might get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
author: Anonymous

quote: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
author: Anonymous

quote: I'm not lazy, I'm just on energy-saving mode.
author: Anonymous

quote: Madness is the result not of uncertainty but of certainty.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Insanity is relative. It depends on who has who locked in what cage.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
author: Anonymous

quote: I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I'm good at everything.
author: Anonymous

quote: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
author: Aristotle

quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: Always remember you're unique, just like everyone else.
author: Anonymous
